recipe.content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
    service: auth-api
   name: auth-api
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     env:
      - 
       name: AUTH_API_PORT
       value: '8081'
      - 
       name: JWT_SECRET
       value: myfancysecret
      - 
       name: USERS_API_ADDRESS
       value: 'http://users-api:8083'
     image: eivantsov/auth-api
     imagePullPolicy: Always
     name: auth-api
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8081
     restartPolicy: Always
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
   name: auth-api
  spec:
   ports:
    - 
     port: 8081
   selector:
    service: auth-api
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
    service: frontend
   name: frontend
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     env:
      - 
       name: AUTH_API_ADDRESS
       value: 'http://auth-api:8081'
      - 
       name: PORT
       value: '8080'
      - 
       name: TODOS_API_ADDRESS
       value: 'http://todos-api:8082'
     image: eivantsov/frontend
     name: frontend
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8080
     imagePullPolicy: Always
     restartPolicy: Always
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
   name: frontend
  spec:
   ports:
    - 
     port: 8080
   selector:
    service: frontend
   type: LoadBalancer
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
    service: redis
   name: redis
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     env:
      - 
       name: AUTH_API_ADDRESS
       value: 'http://auth-api:8081'
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 6379
     image: redis
     name: redis
     imagePullPolicy: Always
     restartPolicy: Always
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
   name: redis
  spec:
   ports:
    - 
     port: 6379
   selector:
    service: redis
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
    service: todos-api
   name: todos-api
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     env:
      - 
       name: JWT_SECRET
       value: myfancysecret
      - 
       name: TODO_API_PORT
       value: '8082'
      - 
       name: REDIS_HOST
       value: redis
      - 
       name: REDIS_PORT
       value: '6379'
     image: eivantsov/todos-api
     name: todos-api
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8082
     imagePullPolicy: Always
     restartPolicy: Always
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
   name: todos-api
  spec:
   ports:
    - 
     port: 8082
   selector:
    service: todos-api
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
    service: users-api
   name: users-api
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     env:
      - 
       name: JWT_SECRET
       value: myfancysecret
      - 
       name: SERVER_PORT
       value: '8083'
     image: eivantsov/users-api
     name: users-api
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8083
      - 
       containerPort: 8000
     imagePullPolicy: Always
     restartPolicy: Always
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 1536Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
   name: users-api
  spec:
   ports:
    - 
     name: web
     port: 8083
     protocol: TCP
    - 
     port: 8000
     name: debug
     protocol: TCP
   selector:
    service: users-api
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: pod1
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     image: 'eclipse/ubuntu_jdk8:latest'
     name: java
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 1536Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: pod2
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     image: eivantsov/gols
     name: go
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi

commands.commandLine:
echo "[INFO]: Killing auth server..."
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8081 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
echo "[INFO]: Auth server is stopped..."
commands.name: auth-api-stop

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8080 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
echo "[INFO]: Frontend is stopped..."
commands.name: frontend-stop

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8082 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
echo "[INFO]: TODOs API is stopped..."
commands.name: todos-api-stop

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8082 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
cd ${current.project.path}/todos-api
npm start
commands.name: todos-api-update

commands.commandLine:
echo "[INFO]: Killing auth server..."
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8081 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
cp ${current.project.path}/auth-api/*.go /$GOPATH/src/app
cd $GOPATH/src/app
echo "[INFO]: Compiling binary..."
go build -o auth-api
echo "[INFO]: Starting auth server"
./auth-api
commands.name: auth-api-restart

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8083 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
cd /projects/microservice-app-example/users-api/target
echo "[INFO]: Starting users-api app..."
java -jar *.jar
echo "[INFO]: App is started"
commands.name: user-api-start

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8083 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
echo "[INFO]: App is stopped"
commands.name: user-api-stop

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8080 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
cd  /projects/microservice-app-example/frontend/
npm start
commands.name: frontend-start

commands.commandLine:
pid=$(netstat -tulpn | grep 8083 | awk '{print $7}' | rev | cut -d"/" -f2-  | rev)
kill $pid
cd ${current.project.path}/users-api/target
echo "[INFO]: Starting users-api app in debug mode..."
java -jar -Xdebug -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=8000 -Dserver.port=8083 *.jar
echo "[INFO]: App is started in debug mode"
commands.name: user-api-debug
